name: Es Selendang Mayang
description: Es Selendang Mayang is traditional drink from Jakarta or especially Betawi
directions: Mix together all the flour and water ingredients.
Split evenly into 3 parts and add color paste.
Cook the white color first until you clot and change color. Remove and then put in a row / mold
The second one cooks again the green mixture and does the same thing as the first pan. Then put d over the first batter.
Comb brown sugar, Cook all the sugar sauce ingredients until thickened. Then put d glass. Set aside.
Place the ice cubes in a serving bowl. Cut the box stretching the mayang shawl and put it on ice cubes, flush it with coconut milk and sugar broth. Serve.
